campingRules.name: No open fires
campingRules.description: Fires must be contained in a designated fire pit.
campingRules.penalty: Fines and/or eviction from the campground.

campingRules.name: Quiet hours
campingRules.penalty: Verbal warning, followed by fines and/or eviction from the campground.

campingRules.name: No pets
campingRules.description: Pets are not allowed in the campground.
campingRules.penalty: Fines and/or eviction from the campground.
